query: What is their current academic position and affiliation?
expected_answer: Assistant Professor at University of Minnesota, Twin Cities since 2021.
Smitha Muthya Sudheendra (Ph.D. student) and others.

query: List three major awards or honors they received after 2020.
expected_answer: • 2022–2024 Grammarly Research Gift Award; • 2023 Cisco Research Award; • 2024 Open Philanthropy Gift Award.

query: Name two conferences where they served as Senior PC or Program Chair.
expected_answer: Senior PC at AAAI 2023, AAAI 2024; Founder and Co‑organizer of the Pluralistic Alignment Workshop at NeurIPS 2024.

query: Which grants did they receive in 2023 and their amounts?
expected_answer: • Computing Grant from OpenAI ($25,000); • UMN Clinical and Translational Science Institute Grant ($50,000).

query: What courses have they taught in Spring 2023?
expected_answer: CSCI 5541 – Natural Language Processing; CSCI 5980 – NLP with Deep Learning.
